original_title: Love Ain't Suppose to Hurt 2: The Wedding
overview: When Tracie decides to wed the man of her dreams, an unforeseen accident causes her to contend with yet another issue from her troubled past. With a little luck, Tracie's straight-shooting, Bible-toting Aunt Shirley will be able to shed some light on the situation. That is, if a secret from Aunt Shirley's own past doesn't cloud her better judgment.  Tommy Ford  Marcus Nelson  Bridgette Bentley  Nei-Ce Knight-Preuitt  Rickie Vermont  Rory Darvel  Shanelle Solomon  Carey Durrell  Axnt  Tommy A. Ford  Darrell Carey  Ax'nt  Carey Durell
title: Love Ain't Suppose to Hurt 2: The Wedding
